extendedInfo.description: New** Extra Stage mode **Special stage difficulty is high.Secret Dragon GET in clear extra stage 20â» Secret Dragon_Rarity 1*** Collection and Puzzle Game ***DragonLife is a interesting match-3 simple puzzle game!You can buy "soul" using coins that you gather by playing stages!Also at advanced stages, the egg of new dragons can be got!So gradually you gather new interesting dragons!** How to play ** - Touch and slide the dragon with finger to change its position. You can erase 3 or more dragons by putting them on the same line!- Get point by erasing dragons.- Make longer chain of dragons to get more points!The game has world ranking. Play and put your name on the global ranking!** Play Mode **Clear a stage to go to the next stage. On the back side of some dragons, there are blocks. Break a block by erasing its front dragon.When all blocks are broken, next stage will be unlocked! Play and take the challenge!Classic mode:In this mode, whenever it exceeds a fixed score, the level goes up. If the level goes up, the timer becomes quicker.upto what level can you continue? Take the challenge!This mode has world ranking!

reviews.title: Not impressed
reviews.comment: When I start app, it goes black screen and doesn\'t start. I\'ve uninstalled & reinstalled several times, still does it.
reviews.author: Jeffrey Kahler

reviews.title: WAS a great game
reviews.comment: This game was awesome till I installed the updates today. Now the game freezes so I have to restart the level which means I lose a life....REALLY SUCKS
reviews.author: van johns

reviews.title: Fun,excellent game
reviews.comment: Really enjoy the game,keeps me occupied when bored,kids even enjoy the game.
reviews.author: Annette Hefner

reviews.title: Exelent
reviews.comment: Best game yet to date lots of different puzzles always working your mind fun& intense very intense &challeging &im only on stage2o love everthing so far
reviews.author: Kim Gotfrey
